title: Ashe skin
body: Where is her quiver the new championship skin is dope but where the quiver at.{{champion:22}}

replies.body: It looks like she shoots arrows made out of magic (much like the base skin), if you are conjuring your arrows out of thin air you don't need a quiver.
You conjure them out of the two banner things floating behind her

Yeah i played a couple games with it and see the magic theme. Different from the Woad Ashe were it is "real" arrows. After playing with it I very much like it and think it fits well with the theme. sorry for being a pain!!! carry on XD
